Inglewood.Faircrest Heights, Los Angeles:
Faircrest Heights is a neighborhood in Central Los Angeles, California.


== Geography ==


=== Google Maps ===
Faircrest Heights is bounded by Alvira Street on the West, Fairfax Avenue on the East, Pico Boulevard on the North and Sawyer Avenue on the South. 


=== Adjacent Neighborhoods ===
Reynier Village is located to the west, the Carthay Square, Little Ethiopia and South Carthay neighborhoods are to the north, and Picfair Village is located to the east.
